	//=================================================================================================================
	// Ancient passive buffs
	//=================================================================================================================
	"imba_ancient_buffs"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"										"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"								"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
		"AbilityTextureName"							"backdoor_protection"
		"MaxLevel"										"1"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"								"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"bonus_armor"							"5"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"								"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"ancient_health"						"15000"
			}
		}

		"OnUpgrade"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"							"hero/ancient_abilities.lua"
				"Function"								"AncientHealth"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_imba_ancient_buffs_base"
			{
				"Passive"								"1"
				"IsHidden"								"1"
				"IsBuff"								"1"
				"IsPurgable"							"0"

				"Attributes"							"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_IGNORE_INVULNERABLE"

				"ThinkInterval"							"0.5"

				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"					"hero/ancient_abilities.lua"
						"Function"						"AncientThink"
					}
				}

				"OnAttacked"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"					"hero/ancient_abilities.lua"
						"Function"						"AncientAttacked"
					}
				}

				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ABILITY_LAYOUT"			"6"
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS"	"%bonus_armor"
				}
			}
		}
	}
